description: Main entry point for a Flutter application, defining the widget tree and app structure.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page, displaying app title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI of MyHomePage, displaying a scaffold with app bar and body.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function that runs the app by calling runApp with MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of widget classes returning widget tree; used in MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
